Staff, rare (requires attunement by a druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard)
This staff of gnarled, rotted wood ends in a hooked curvature like a twisted shepherdâ€™s crook. The staff has 10 charges. While holding it, you can use an action to expend 1 or more of its charges to cast one of the following spells from it, using your spell save DC: @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.f1ovNdb57AhbmDUn]{bestow curse} (3 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.bf9OcuTnbJoaUueU]{blight} (4 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.BmdIVMXTMLCp6Nu7]{contagion} (5 charges), @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.FITcXCcDkoWdG3PH]{false life} (1 charge), or @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.13zzjc5Zetws3ydX]{hallow} (5 charges).
The staff regains 1d6 + 4 expended charges daily at dusk. If you expend the last charge, roll a d20. On a 1, the staff turns to live maggots and is destroyed.
